item.name: User Management
item.description:
The following commands are provided for convenience if you want to make API requests without using the frontend app.

Sign-up a new user:

``` shell
aws cognito-idp sign-up --client-id clientId --username username --password password --user-attributes Name=email,Value=

```

Authenticate the newly created user:

``` shell
aws cognito-idp initiate-auth --client-id clientId --auth-parameters USERNAME=username,PASSWORD=password --auth-flow USER_PASSWORD_AUTH

```

The previous command will give you an `IdToken`, paste its value in the environment attached to this collection.
